style="font-size: smaller;" | # {{note label|codisc|1|}} with [[Osamu Muramatsu|O. Muramatsu]] # {{note label|codisc|2|}} with [[Masaru Inoue (astronomer)|M. Inoue]] # {{note label|codisc|3|}} with [[Reiki Kushida|R. Kushida]] |} {{Nihongo|'''Yoshio Kushida'''|串田 嘉男|Kushida Yoshio|born September 19, 1957, [[Hachioji, Tokyo]] }} is a Japanese [[astronomer]]. He is a prolific discoverer of [[asteroid]]s. He discovered [[comet]] [[144P/Kushida]] and was co-discoverer of comet [[147P/Kushida-Muramatsu]]. ==External links== * http://www.nayoro-star.jp/photo/tenmondai-houmon/kushida.html (in Japanese) * http://www.obusession.com/guest/guest058.htm {{Persondata | NAME = Kushida, Yoshio | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese astronomer | DATE OF BIRTH = September 19, 1957 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Hachioji, Tokyo | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kushida, Yoshio}} [[Category:1957 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:20th-century astronomers]] [[Category:Japanese astronomers]] [[Category:Discoverers of asteroids]] {{japan-astronomer-stub}}
